question: In the future, all cars, buses and trucks will be driverless. The only people travelling inside these vehicles will be passengers.                                                                                              Do you Think the advantage of driverless vehicles outweigh the disadvantages?
text: During this era, it is indisputable that the globe was comprehended by the innovation of technology. Percentage of the advance soared up until in a few years later overall vehicles will be driverless. This essay will explore positive and negative variables and express my view in the end.

Beginning with advantages, numerous electrical vehicles have been raised over the period of time. First and foremost, it can be noticeable that the vast majority of accidents were road collisions. This circumstance demonstrates driverless machines to be the automatic assistance in reducing the inclusive incidence. To clarify, passengers need to be concerned about being asleep in the car as the vehicle can do all of the driving. Moreover, having an automated driver will lead to the effectiveness of an individual’s needs as helping a teenager go to school or college.

On the contrary, even though an electrical automobile has several positive variables, the users should not overlook the drawbacks. Once the world begins to use a driverless machines, the amount of  unemploy will dramatically increase as the driving industry careers have already declined. Thus, the governments are necessary to prepare a way to solve this phenomenon. Moreover, It is difficult for consumers to trust that the vehicle has enough potential to be worked on, especially for the elderly.  Likewise, producers need to make sure about the accuracy of the vehicles, which sparks  the reliability of the driverless motors.

In conclusion, using an automatic automobile entails a great number of benefits, but also causes several concerning points to the users. However, from my perspective, I thought that the advantages of driverless cars extremely outweigh the negative effects as these values will be beneficial for the whole humanities’ future and  reduce the accident rates.
